nodes.text: Csaplar was the capital city of the planet Csilla and the Chiss Ascendancy. By the time of the rise of the Galactic Empire, most of the city was located underground, well below Csilla's icy surface.

The Csaplar spaceport was one of few populated aboveground locations in the city. Most of the other aboveground populated areas were either government business or trade-related, and in either case were aboveground mainly to present the false appearance to off world visitors that Csaplar and Csilla were far more populated than they were in reality.
